=== About Me ===

Hello, I'm Claus Christensen. I am a long time contributor to KDE. I have contributed to the KDE wikis, translations (to Danish), documentation and the <nowiki>[[http://forums.kde.org|KDE Forums]]</nowiki>. My main interests in Kubuntu are documentation and the Kubuntu wiki.

=== IRC Channels ===

You can find me in #kubuntu, #kubuntu-deve, #kde-www, #kde-docs and #kde-devel on freenode.

=== Contributions ===

I helped migrate the <nowiki>[[http://usedbase.kde.org/Kubuntu|Kubuntu documentation]]</nowiki> to its new home as well as translated it to Danish.

=== Future Goals ===

To continue working with Kubuntu documentation.
